name: Andrea

services.title: Web development
services.description: I worked for more than one year for a company called Planeat.eco. The tasks I enjoyed most were backend ones, such as building and testing APIs, interacting with the database and learning about containers. I learned to work in an Agile environemnt with test driven development coding approach.

services.title: Mobile Development
services.description: One of the projects I am mostly proud of is called Advanced Workout Clock. It's a HIIT timer that i built during covid pandemic to track workouts and progress with my activities.

services.title: Blockchain development
services.description: During my Master's degree I've been able to deepen the wonderful blockchain techology. In this field I built a Hyperledger Fabric network from scratch, with a customised chaincode. Moreover, I wrote an essay regarding security issues in the smart contracts of Ethereum. Finally, I created Zero Knowledge Chaum Pedersen Proofs and a system inspired by Ethreum ZK rollups to enable users to verify their privacy preferences.

services.title: Data Science
services.description: During my Master's I took various AI classes and sharpened my skills in this field. I did various projects from recommender sytems using machine learning techniques like KNN to classifiers using Tensorflow deep learning models.

aboutpara: I'm a M.Sc student of computer science at the University of Insubria, Varese. During my Bachelor's degree I fell in love with web and mobile development, and my efforts in this field were rewarded by finding a part-time job as a full-stack Agile web developer that I carried on during my studies. On my Master's degree I deepened topics about machine learning, privacy, cryptography and blockchain, with which I am doing my thesis.

resume.tagline: ðŸ‘‹  I'm MsC student in Computer Science
resume.description: I have delivered world-class user experiences to millions of people. Well-versed with React, Javascript, and most of the Web frameworks.

experiences.bullets: Worked on the frontend of a React application, Worked on the frontend of a React application
